description: Convert any link into a QR code and get a shareable image link in seconds. Create codes for websites, apps, forms, and more with minimal effort. Streamline sharing across print, packaging, signage, and events.

capabilities.name: url_to_qrcode
capabilities.description: Convert a URL into a QR code image and return the download link. The QR code will be saved as a PNG file and accessible via HTTP.
